title: Hail, happy day! thou day of holy rest

verses.text:
Hail, happy day! thou day of holy rest;
What heavenly peace doth transport fill
our breast
When Christ, the Lord of grace, in love
descends,
And kindly holds communion with his
friends!

Let earth and all its vanities be gone,
Move from my sight, and leave my soul
alone;
In flattering, fading glories I despise,
And to immortal beauties turn my eyes.
